snippet: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady could again be facing a four-game suspension for the scandal known as Deflategate after federal appeals court judges spent time Thursday shredding some of his union's favorite arguments for dismissal....
lead_paragraph: New England Patriots quarterback Tom Brady could again be facing a four-game suspension for the scandal known as Deflategate after federal appeals court judges spent time Thursday shredding some of his union's favorite arguments for dismissal.

headline.main: Brady Suspension Back on the Table After Deflategate Appeal
headline.print_headline: Brady Suspension Back on the Table After Deflategate Appeal
